'Giants' is an instrumental post-rock band based out of Cedar Falls, Iowa that
formed in the summer of 2005. Giants have had four releases: a self-titled, self-
released demo ep in 2006, âThey, The Undeservingâ in 2007, "Old Stories" in 2008
and a Split 7" with Beware of Safety in 2011.
